titles.title: Congratulating the people and Government of the Republic of Slovenia on the 28th anniversary of the country's independence.
Congratulating the people and Government of the Republic of Slovenia on the 28th anniversary of the country's independence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution commends Slovenia on the progress it has made since its independence and its efforts to promote stability both regionally and internationally. The resolution also recognizes the important contributions of the Slovenian community in the United States.
